text: Bermuda competed at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships in Gwangju, South Korea from 12 to 28 July. ==Swimming== Bermuda entered three swimmers. ;Men {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Heat !colspan="2"|Semifinal !colspan="2"|Final |-style="font-size:95%" !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank |- |align=left rowspan=2|Jesse Washington |align=left|100 m freestyle |51.67 |69 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|100 m butterfly |57.29 |61 |colspan=4|Did not advance |} ;Women {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Heat !colspan="2"|Semifinal !colspan="2"|Final |-style="font-size:95%" !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank |- |align=left rowspan=2|Elan Daley |align=left|100 m freestyle |57.00 |42 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|200 m freestyle |2:05.47 |38 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left rowspan=2|Maddy Moore |align=left|50 m freestyle |26.48 |43 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|50 m butterfly |28.02 |38 |colspan=4|Did not advance |} ==References== Category:Nations at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships Category:Bermuda at the World Aquatics Championships World Aquatics Championships
title: Bermuda at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships
